sections.text:
81-1584.01.Custodial care, defined.

Custodial care shall mean the continued observation, monitoring, and care of a facility for a minimum of one hundred years following the operational life of the facility and closure pursuant to the rules and regulations of the department.

SourceLaws 1987, LB 426, ยง 5;Laws 1996, LB 1201, ยง 6.
